events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems and customer's desire to return the product.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah Johnson for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product tag is still attached?
Sure, the order number is 789456123. Yes, the tag is still attached to the jacket and the product is unused.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we'll email shortly. Refund will be processed within 5 business days after receipt.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the jacket back today.
The refund case is now considered resolved. Please let us know if you have any other questions or require further assistance.
We wanted to follow up and confirm that your refund has been processed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
The refund case has been closed. We hope to serve you better next time and thank you for choosing our store.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email to collect feedback about our refund process.
